item.title: Aivilk add a quote by Samuel Beckett
item.description: "All of old. Nothing else ever. Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try again. Fail again. Fail better." -- Samuel Beckett

item.title: Aivilk add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Aivilk add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "As far as I'm concerned, if something is so complicated that you can't explain it in 10 seconds, then it's probably not worth knowing anyway." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Aivilk add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "Reality continues to ruin my life." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Aivilk add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "I wish I had more friends, but people are such jerks. If you can just get most people to leave you alone, you're doing good. If you can find even one person you really like, you're lucky. And if that person can also stand you, you're really lucky." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Aivilk add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "Every time I've built character, I've regretted it." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Aivilk add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "I go to school, but I never learn what I want to know." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Aivilk add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "Sometimes when I'm talking, my words can't keep up with my thoughts. I wonder why we think faster than we speak. Probably so we can think twice." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Aivilk add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "I hate to think that all my current experiences will someday become stories with no point." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Aivilk add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "I'd hate to have a kid like me." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Aivilk add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "I'm a 21st-century kid trapped in a 19th-century family." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Aivilk add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "Ms. Wormwood: Calvin, can you tell us what Lewis and Clark did? Calvin: No, but I can recite the secret superhero origin of each member of Captain Napalm's Thermonuclear League of Liberty. Ms. Wormwood: See me after class, Calvin. Calvin: [retrospectively] I'm not dumb. I just have a command of thoroughly useless information." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Aivilk add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "I'm not afraid of death; I just don't want to be there when it happens." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Aivilk add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "It is said that your life flashes before your eyes just before you die. That is true, it's called Life." -- Terry Pratchett
